Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/69th
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 63rd, Damen, 69th, and Western due to, street blockage near Western/69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 63rd, Damen, 69th, and Western due to, street blockage near Western/69th.

Allow extra travel time.
